arStrings.szText: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a Poisoned enemy with a {c_important}Shadow Imbued{/c} Skill has up to a {c_number} {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}{/c} chance to create a toxic explosion that applies {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds to the target and surrounding enemies.
